mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhihu_user( id, user_name, user_sex, home_page, self_introduction, home, industry, career_experience, educational_experience, personal_profile, user_image, following, followers, following_topics, following_column, following_questions, following_collections, get_approval, get_thanks, get_collections, lives, certification_info, zhihu_collection, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userName}, #{userSex}, #{homePage}, #{selfIntroduction}, #{home}, #{industry}, #{careerExperience}, #{educationalExperience}, #{personalProfile}, #{userImage}, #{following}, #{followers}, #{followingTopics}, #{followingColumn}, #{followingQuestions}, #{followingCollections}, #{getApproval}, #{getThanks}, #{getCollections}, #{lives}, #{certificationInfo}, #{zhihuCollection}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
